pullrequest.title: Fix issue #37: incorrect transition to manual/buffered semantics for novatech.

content.raw: Tested, and we don’t see regressions when _not_ using aligned phase mode. Merging, since what was there was broken already when using aligned phase mode , but interested to hear from @{557058:411f7712-e1fa-438c-b578-0359da2d9f06} if it works as expected.
content.html: Tested, and we don’t see regressions when not using aligned phase mode. Merging, since what was there was broken already when using aligned phase mode , but interested to hear from @David Meyer if it works as expected.
